title: 39% win ratio. matchmaking system is broken
body:
20~25 out of my 60 loses from afks delays noobs. 

im now really tired and sick of this because those braindeads are in my game dramatically everytime.

doesnt matter how good you are, ur teammates will determine your win or lose

replies.body: But mate, 25% of your wins are from afk's and noobs too!
Nah when it's the enemy it's his skill, when it's an ally it's the matchmaking system being rigged.
